DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : BUSINESS : REDONDO PIER MAY REOPEN IN JANUARY
DOC.TEXT: The Redondo Beach municipal pier is_on the mend . Officials say reconstruction of the Horseshoe Pier , which sustained more_than $ 6 million in damage from storms and a fire in 1988 , could be finished by the end of the year . They hope for a reopening celebration in January . Officials met with merchants and residents Saturday to give an update on the progress of the reconstruction , which began in July . The project is expected to cost $ 11 million . JAMES BENNING
